description: This file defines the HotelService class, providing methods to fetch hotel data from an API, including fetching a list of hotels with optional query filtering and fetching detailed information for a specific hotel.

classes.name: HotelService
classes.description: A service class responsible for communicating with the backend API to retrieve hotel information.

methods.name: fetchHotels
methods.description: Fetches a list of hotels, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: fetchHotelDetail
methods.description: Fetches detailed information about a specific hotel by ID.
